tradeGoods.name: Sack of Grain
tradeGoods.description: A heavy burlap sack filled with wheat or barley

fumble.text: The sack tears open, spilling grain everywhere and creating a slippery mess. You fall prone and the enemy gains +2 to their next attack.

success.text: You swing the heavy sack with surprising force, stunning your opponent. Enemy loses their next action.

critical.text: The sack bursts open in a cloud of grain dust, blinding all enemies within 10 feet for 2 rounds while you deliver a devastating blow for +1d4 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Iron Pot
tradeGoods.description: A sturdy cooking pot made of cast iron

fumble.text: The pot gets stuck on your head! You are blinded until you spend an action to remove it.

success.text: You ring the pot like a bell next to the enemy's ear, causing disorientation. Enemy suffers -2 to all rolls for 2 rounds.

critical.text: You deliver a resounding blow with the pot that echoes across the battlefield. All enemies within 20 feet are deafened and take 1d3 damage from the sonic boom.

tradeGoods.name: Rope (50 feet)
tradeGoods.description: A coil of sturdy hemp rope

fumble.text: You get tangled in your own rope! You are restrained until you spend an action to free yourself.

success.text: You expertly lasso the enemy, pulling them off balance. Enemy is knocked prone.

critical.text: You create an impromptu snare that trips multiple foes. All enemies within 15 feet must make a Reflex save or be knocked prone and take 1d2 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Barrel of Ale
tradeGoods.description: A wooden barrel filled with frothy ale

fumble.text: The barrel breaks open, soaking you in ale. You smell strongly of alcohol and suffer -1 to all social interactions for the rest of the day.

success.text: You splash ale in the enemy's eyes, temporarily blinding them. Enemy suffers -4 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: The barrel explodes in a shower of ale and wood splinters. All creatures within 10 feet take 1d6 damage and are knocked prone by the alcoholic explosion.

tradeGoods.name: Bag of Salt
tradeGoods.description: A leather pouch filled with precious salt crystals

fumble.text: You accidentally pour salt in your own eyes! You are blinded for 1 round.

success.text: You throw salt in the enemy's wounds, causing excruciating pain. Enemy takes 1 additional damage and -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You create a ring of salt that burns unholy creatures. All undead or demonic enemies within 15 feet take 2d4 damage and must make a Will save or flee for 2 rounds.

tradeGoods.name: Bolt of Cloth
tradeGoods.description: A roll of fine linen or wool fabric

fumble.text: The cloth unravels and wraps around your legs. You are slowed (half movement) for 2 rounds.

success.text: You unfurl the cloth dramatically, confusing your foe. Enemy loses their next action as they try to figure out what just happened.

critical.text: You create an impromptu cloak of concealment. You become invisible for 1 round and your next attack gains +4 to hit and +2 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Oil (1 flask)
tradeGoods.description: A clay flask filled with lamp oil

fumble.text: You accidentally spill oil on yourself! You become slippery and suffer -2 to all attack rolls for 2 rounds.

success.text: You splash oil on the enemy, making them slippery. Enemy suffers -2 to attack rolls for 2 rounds.

critical.text: You create a slick oil trap that causes the enemy to slip and fall hard, taking extra damage and losing their footing.

tradeGoods.name: Bag of Coins
tradeGoods.description: A heavy purse filled with various coins

fumble.text: The bag tears open and coins scatter everywhere! You slip on the coins and fall prone, giving the enemy +2 to their next attack.

success.text: You swing the heavy bag of coins like a flail, stunning your opponent with the weight of wealth. Enemy loses their next action.

critical.text: You scatter coins in the enemy's eyes while delivering a devastating blow with the bag itself, blinding and damaging them.

tradeGoods.name: Black Grimoire
tradeGoods.description: A sinister tome bound in black leather, filled with ominous runes

fumble.text: The book snaps shut on your fingers with unnatural force. You take 1d2 damage.

success.text: You wave the book and mutter strange words. Enemy hesitates, losing their next action.

critical.text: The book pulses with dark power, unleashing a wave of dread. All enemies within 15 feet must save or flee for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Book
tradeGoods.description: A plain, worn volume of common tales or knowledge

fumble.text: You drop the book and stumble over it, falling prone.

success.text: You slap the enemy with the book’s weight. They suffer -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You read a surprisingly cutting line aloud, distracting the foe. Your next attack gains +2 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Bridle
tradeGoods.description: A leather bridle with iron bit, used for controlling horses

fumble.text: The bridle tangles in your arms. You are restrained until you spend an action freeing yourself.

success.text: You whip the bridle across your foe’s face. They suffer -2 to their next attack.

critical.text: You loop the bridle around the enemy’s neck and yank, choking them. They take +1d4 damage and lose their next action.

tradeGoods.name: Bundle of Wood
tradeGoods.description: A bundle of kindling tied with rope

fumble.text: The bundle bursts apart, scattering across the ground and tripping you. You fall prone.

success.text: You swing the bundle like a club, splintering wood against your foe. They suffer -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You smash the bundle on your enemy, showering them with splinters. They take +1d3 damage and are blinded for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Candles (20)
tradeGoods.description: A bundle of wax candles, bound together with string

fumble.text: A candle breaks and hot wax drips on you. You take 1 damage and suffer -1 to next attack.

success.text: You fling burning candles at your enemy. They suffer -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: You scatter candles at your foe’s feet, flames catching on their clothing. They take +1d4 fire damage and are distracted.

tradeGoods.name: Cheese Dip
tradeGoods.description: A bowl of pungent melted cheese

fumble.text: The cheese spills onto you, leaving you sticky and embarrassed. You suffer -1 to attack for 2 rounds.

success.text: You fling hot cheese at your foe. They take 1 damage and -1 to next attack.

critical.text: You splash the cheese across your enemy’s eyes, blinding them for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Chicken Meat (5 lbs.)
tradeGoods.description: A wrapped bundle of raw chicken meat

fumble.text: The meat slips from your hands, leaving you off balance. Enemy gains +1 to next attack.

success.text: You slap your foe with raw chicken, humiliating them. They suffer -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: You hurl the meat in a perfect arc, distracting multiple foes as stray dogs or vermin swarm. All enemies suffer -1 to attack for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Clay (1 lb.)
tradeGoods.description: A lump of soft gray clay

fumble.text: The clay crumbles in your hand, coating you and reducing your grip. -1 to attack next round.

success.text: You hurl clay at your foe’s face, blinding them for 1 round.

critical.text: You smear clay across your enemy’s weapon, clogging it. Their next attack suffers -3 penalty.

tradeGoods.name: Crutches
tradeGoods.description: A worn pair of wooden crutches

fumble.text: You get tangled in the crutches and fall prone.

success.text: You jab a crutch at your foe’s stomach, knocking them back. Enemy is knocked prone.

critical.text: You slam both crutches together on your enemy’s head, stunning them. Enemy loses next action and takes +1d4 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Deer Pelt
tradeGoods.description: A thick pelt from a hunted deer

fumble.text: The pelt slips from your hands, tangling your legs. You are slowed for 1 round.

success.text: You toss the pelt in your foe’s face, blinding them temporarily. Enemy loses next action.

critical.text: You wrap the pelt around your foe’s head, choking them briefly. They take +1d3 damage and -2 to next attack.

tradeGoods.name: Dice
tradeGoods.description: A pair of carved bone dice

fumble.text: The dice slip, scattering across the ground. You waste your action retrieving them.

success.text: You flick a die at your enemy’s eye, distracting them. They suffer -1 to attack next round.

critical.text: You roll the dice with uncanny luck, and the gods smile. Gain +2 to your next attack roll.

tradeGoods.name: Fabric (3 yards)
tradeGoods.description: A colorful stretch of fabric, cut into 3 yards

fumble.text: The fabric wraps around your arms, hindering movement. You take -2 to attack for 1 round.

success.text: You wave the fabric like a matador’s cape, tricking the foe into missing. Gain +2 to AC against their next attack.

critical.text: You use the fabric to bind your enemy’s arms, leaving them helpless. They lose next action.

tradeGoods.name: Falcon
tradeGoods.description: A trained hunting bird with sharp talons

fumble.text: The falcon mistakes you for prey and claws you. Take 1d3 damage.

success.text: You command the falcon to dive at your enemy’s face. Enemy suffers -2 to attack rolls next round.

critical.text: The falcon tears into the foe’s eyes with precision. Enemy takes +1d6 damage and is blinded for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Fine Dirt (1 lb.)
tradeGoods.description: A small sack of carefully sifted, smooth dirt

fumble.text: The dirt spills in your own face, blinding you for 1 round.

success.text: You throw dirt in your enemy’s eyes, blinding them. They lose next action.

critical.text: You scatter dirt in a wide arc, blinding multiple foes. All enemies within 10 feet suffer -2 to next attack.

tradeGoods.name: Fine Stone (10 lbs.)
tradeGoods.description: A heavy, polished block of stone

fumble.text: You drop the stone on your foot. Take 1d4 damage.

success.text: You heave the stone at your foe, knocking them flat. Enemy is prone.

critical.text: The stone crashes down with crushing force. Enemy takes +1d6 damage and suffers -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Fine Suit of Clothes
tradeGoods.description: An elegant suit of noble finery

fumble.text: You trip over your finery while trying to use it dramatically. Lose next action.

success.text: You distract your foe with a flourish of fine clothing. Enemy suffers -1 to attack rolls.

critical.text: You strike a dazzling pose in fine clothes, unsettling enemies. All foes within 10 feet suffer -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Fine Suits (3 sets)
tradeGoods.description: Three matching sets of fancy clothes

fumble.text: You get tangled in the extra fabric, hindering your movement. -2 to attacks this round.

success.text: You hurl the extra suits at your foe, distracting them. They suffer -2 to next attack.

critical.text: You drape the suits dramatically across the battlefield. Enemies within 10 feet are distracted, giving you +2 on next attack.

tradeGoods.name: Fine Tools
tradeGoods.description: A set of precision tools crafted for artisans

fumble.text: You stab yourself with a sharp tool. Take 1d2 damage.

success.text: You jab a sharp tool into your foe. They take +1 damage.

critical.text: You drive a tool into a weak spot in enemy armor. Enemy takes +1d4 damage and suffers -1 to attack rolls.

tradeGoods.name: Flour (1 lb.)
tradeGoods.description: A small sack of fine flour

fumble.text: You spill flour all over yourself, sneezing uncontrollably. Lose next action.

success.text: You throw flour in your enemy’s eyes, blinding them. They lose next action.

critical.text: You create a flour cloud in the air, choking and blinding foes. All enemies within 10 feet suffer -2 to attacks for 2 rounds.

tradeGoods.name: Gem worth 20 gp
tradeGoods.description: A glittering gemstone, small but valuable

fumble.text: The gem slips from your hand and shatters on the ground. You lose 20 gp of value and your action.

success.text: You hurl the gem with surprising force, striking your foe’s temple. Enemy suffers -2 to next attack.

critical.text: The gem flashes with inner brilliance as it hits, dazzling all who see it. Your foe takes +1d4 damage and all enemies within 10 feet suffer -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Glass Beads
tradeGoods.description: A string of colorful glass beads, fragile but eye-catching

fumble.text: The beads scatter across the ground, causing you to slip and fall prone.

success.text: You snap the beads into your foe’s eyes, distracting them. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The beads shatter in a dazzling spray of colors, momentarily blinding all enemies within 10 feet. Each suffers -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Gloves (4 pairs)
tradeGoods.description: Four pairs of leather or cloth gloves, sturdy but simple

fumble.text: You fumble with the extra gloves and drop your weapon. Lose next action.

success.text: You slap your foe across the face with a glove in a humiliating challenge. Enemy suffers -2 to their next attack.

critical.text: You stuff a glove into your foe’s mouth, choking them briefly. They take +1d3 damage and lose their next action.

tradeGoods.name: Gold Ring worth 10 gp
tradeGoods.description: A plain but valuable gold band

fumble.text: You slip the ring on your finger and it gets stuck, distracting you. Lose next action.

success.text: You flick the ring at your foe’s eye with surprising force. They suffer -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The ring glitters brilliantly in the light, dazzling your foe as you strike. Gain +2 to hit and +2 damage on your next attack.

tradeGoods.name: Hen
tradeGoods.description: A clucking hen, flustered and noisy when disturbed

fumble.text: The hen pecks and flaps wildly, scratching you and flying from your grip. You take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You fling the hen into your foe’s face, distracting them with feathers and claws. They suffer -2 to their next attack.

critical.text: The hen goes berserk, pecking and clawing ferociously. Your foe takes +1d4 damage and is forced to move back 5 feet.

tradeGoods.name: Herbs (1d6 bunches)
tradeGoods.description: Bundles of pungent herbs, useful in cooking or medicine

fumble.text: The herbs crumble in your hand, filling your nose with choking dust. You cough violently and lose your next action.

success.text: You hurl a bunch of herbs into your foe’s face, stinging their eyes. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The herbs release a cloud of choking pollen. All enemies within 10 feet take -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Herding Dog
tradeGoods.description: A loyal and energetic dog, trained to control livestock

fumble.text: The dog turns on you in confusion, knocking you prone. Lose your next action.

success.text: The dog lunges and snaps at your foe, keeping them at bay. Enemy suffers -1 to their attack roll until your next turn.

critical.text: The dog clamps onto the foe’s arm or leg, shaking violently. The enemy takes +1d6 damage and loses their next action.

tradeGoods.name: Holy Symbol
tradeGoods.description: An emblem of divine power, carved from wood or etched in metal

fumble.text: Your grip slips and the symbol falls, clattering loudly. You are distracted and lose your next action.

success.text: You brandish the symbol with conviction, unnerving your foe. They suffer -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The symbol glows with divine radiance, forcing enemies within 10 feet to avert their eyes. They all take -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Horn
tradeGoods.description: A loud war-horn, used for signals and intimidation

fumble.text: You blow too hard and the horn splits with a shriek. The noise deafens you briefly, imposing -2 on your next attack roll.

success.text: You blast the horn at close range, startling your foe. They suffer -2 to their next attack.

critical.text: The horn’s thunderous call echoes with supernatural force, causing enemies within 20 feet to falter. They each take -1d3 damage and suffer -2 to their next attack.

tradeGoods.name: Lantern
tradeGoods.description: An iron lantern, useful for light but also a sturdy bludgeon

fumble.text: The lantern slips, spilling burning oil dangerously close to you. Take 1 fire damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You swing the lantern into your foe’s face, dazing them. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The lantern shatters across your foe, spraying oil and flame. They take +1d6 fire damage and are set ablaze, taking 1 additional damage on their next turn.

tradeGoods.name: Lizard, Pet
tradeGoods.description: A small lizard with sharp claws and quick movements

fumble.text: The lizard bites your hand and scurries away. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You fling the lizard onto your foe, where it scratches and claws. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The lizard clamps onto your foe’s face, scratching eyes and skin. Enemy takes +1d4 damage and is blinded for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Livestock (2 sheep)
tradeGoods.description: Two bleating sheep, stubborn and heavy

fumble.text: The sheep panic and knock you over. You are prone and lose your next action.

success.text: You drive a sheep into your foe’s legs, unbalancing them. They take -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: Both sheep slam into your foe, bowling them over. Enemy takes +1d6 damage and is knocked prone.

tradeGoods.name: Net
tradeGoods.description: A tangle of rope netting, perfect for ensnaring foes

fumble.text: The net wraps around you instead. You are entangled and suffer -2 to your next attack.

success.text: You cast the net over your foe, hampering their movements. They suffer -2 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: The net tangles tightly, immobilizing your foe. They cannot move for 1 round and suffer -2 to their attack.

tradeGoods.name: Oil (1 flask)
tradeGoods.description: A flask of slippery and flammable oil

fumble.text: The flask bursts in your hand, spilling over you. You are slick with oil and suffer -2 to your next action.

success.text: You splash oil at your foe, making their footing treacherous. They suffer -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: The oil splashes across your foe, leaving them vulnerable. If struck with flame next round, they take +1d6 fire damage.

tradeGoods.name: Ox, Teamster’s
tradeGoods.description: A large, stubborn ox trained for hauling

fumble.text: The ox ignores you and tramples past. You take 1 damage from being shoved aside.

success.text: You urge the ox forward, striking your foe. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The ox charges full force into your foe, goring them. They take +1d8 damage and are knocked prone.

tradeGoods.name: Parchment & Quill
tradeGoods.description: A sheet of parchment and a writing quill, useful for scribbles or blinding dust

fumble.text: The parchment tears uselessly and ink splashes into your eyes. You suffer -2 to your next attack.

success.text: You flick ink or dust from the quill into your foe’s eyes. They suffer -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: The ink blinds your foe completely. They are blinded for 1 round and take -4 to attacks.

tradeGoods.name: Pony
tradeGoods.description: A sturdy, small horse trained for carrying loads

fumble.text: The pony balks and kicks you instead. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You drive the pony forward, striking your foe with hooves. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The pony tramples your foe, knocking them down. They take +1d6 damage and are knocked prone.

tradeGoods.name: Pots & Pans
tradeGoods.description: A rattling set of cookware, useful for clanging distractions

fumble.text: You drop a pan on your foot with a loud crash. Take 1 damage and suffer -1 to your next attack.

success.text: You bash your foe with a pot, leaving them dazed. They suffer -1 to attacks for 1 round.

critical.text: The pot rings like a gong on your foe’s head. They take +1d4 damage and are stunned for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Sack
tradeGoods.description: A large burlap sack, perfect for carrying or capturing

fumble.text: You trip over the sack, entangling yourself. You are prone and lose your next action.

success.text: You throw the sack over your foe, hindering them. They suffer -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: You bag your foe entirely, trapping them inside the sack. They are immobilized for 1 round and suffer -2 to attacks.

tradeGoods.name: Shovel
tradeGoods.description: A sturdy digging tool with a metal blade

fumble.text: You trip over the shovel, hitting yourself. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You swing the shovel at your foe, striking their legs. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You deliver a powerful overhead strike with the shovel. Enemy takes +1d6 damage and is knocked prone.

tradeGoods.name: Side of Beef
tradeGoods.description: A large cut of meat, heavy and unwieldy

fumble.text: The beef slips from your hands and hits you. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You swing the side of beef at your foe, knocking them off balance. They suffer -2 to their next attack.

critical.text: The side of beef smashes into your foe with devastating force. They take +1d8 damage and are knocked prone.

tradeGoods.name: Spyglass
tradeGoods.description: A small telescope, handy for distant observations

fumble.text: The spyglass slips and hits you in the eye. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You whack your foe with the spyglass, causing them to stagger. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You smash the spyglass across your foe’s face. They take +1d4 damage and are blinded for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Steel Helmet
tradeGoods.description: A heavy iron or steel helmet, useful for protection or bludgeoning

fumble.text: The helmet slips and hits your own head. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You slam the helmet into your foe’s head, stunning them briefly. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You bash the helmet with full force, dealing +1d6 damage and knocking the foe prone.

tradeGoods.name: Steel Tongs
tradeGoods.description: A set of sturdy steel tongs, useful for gripping or pinching

fumble.text: The tongs snap shut on your own fingers. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You clamp the tongs onto your foe’s arm, pinching hard. They suffer -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: You clamp the tongs onto your foe viciously. They take +1d4 damage and lose their next action.

tradeGoods.name: Steel Vial
tradeGoods.description: A small steel container, potentially filled with liquids

fumble.text: The vial slips and hits your own foot. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You hurl the vial at your foe, causing a painful sting. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The vial smashes, spraying contents that sting and distract. Enemy takes +1d4 damage and suffers -1 to attacks for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Stinky Cheese
tradeGoods.description: A pungent wheel of cheese with a powerful odor

fumble.text: You drop the cheese on yourself, suffering the stench. You are distracted and lose your next action.

success.text: You fling the cheese at your foe’s face, making them gag. They suffer -2 to their next attack.

critical.text: You smash the stinky cheese onto your foe, overwhelming all enemies nearby with the smell. They take +1d4 damage and -2 to attacks for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Strange-looking Rock
tradeGoods.description: A bizarre rock with unusual shapes or colors

fumble.text: You trip over the rock while trying to throw it. Lose next action.

success.text: You hurl the rock at your foe, catching them off guard. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: The rock hits with unexpected weight and shape, stunning your foe. They take +1d4 damage and lose their next action.

tradeGoods.name: Tarot Deck
tradeGoods.description: A mystical deck of cards used for fortune-telling

fumble.text: The cards scatter wildly, confusing you. Lose your next action.

success.text: You slap a card onto your foe’s face, distracting them. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You throw the whole deck in a flurry, each card slicing and disorienting your foe. They take +1d6 damage and are stunned for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Trowel
tradeGoods.description: A small hand tool for digging or spreading

fumble.text: You poke yourself with the trowel. Take 1 damage and lose your next action.

success.text: You jab the trowel at your foe, causing minor cuts. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You thrust the trowel with precision, dealing +1d4 damage and leaving your foe slowed for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Ukulele
tradeGoods.description: A small stringed instrument, capable of creating distraction

fumble.text: You hit yourself with the ukulele while strumming. Lose your next action.

success.text: You strum a loud, off-key chord, distracting your foe. They suffer -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You unleash a blindingly loud chord. All enemies within 10 feet take +1d4 damage and are stunned for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Waterproof Sack
tradeGoods.description: A durable sack that keeps contents dry, made of oiled cloth

fumble.text: The sack slips from your grip, spilling everything inside. Lose your next action.

success.text: You swing the waterproof sack at your foe, hitting them with its weight. Enemy suffers -1 to their next attack.

critical.text: You hurl the sack with precision, hitting multiple foes if they are nearby. Each enemy takes +1d4 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Wood (10 lbs)
tradeGoods.description: A bundle of firewood or planks, moderately heavy

fumble.text: You trip over the wood bundle and take 1 damage. Lose your next action.

success.text: You swing the wood at your foe, striking them with force. Enemy suffers -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: The wood strikes with crushing force. Enemy takes +1d6 damage and is knocked prone.

tradeGoods.name: Fruit
tradeGoods.description: Fresh fruit, can be tossed or used to distract

fumble.text: The fruit squashes in your hand. Lose your next action.

success.text: You throw the fruit at your foe’s face, causing them to flinch. Enemy suffers -1 to attack rolls for 1 round.

critical.text: You hurl multiple fruits in a flurry, hitting all foes in a 10-foot radius. Each takes +1d4 damage.

tradeGoods.name: Scissors
tradeGoods.description: A pair of sharp cutting scissors

fumble.text: You accidentally cut yourself with the scissors. Take 1 damage.

success.text: You snip at the enemy's clothing or equipment, hampering their movement. Enemy suffers -1 to attack rolls for 2 rounds.

critical.text: You make a precise cut that damages the enemy's gear and wounds them. +1d4 damage and enemy loses their next action.

tradeGoods.name: Jar of honey
tradeGoods.description: A clay jar filled with sticky golden honey

fumble.text: The jar breaks and honey spills all over you. You become sticky and suffer -2 to all rolls for 3 rounds.

success.text: You splash honey in the enemy's eyes, blinding them temporarily. Enemy suffers -3 to attack rolls for 2 rounds.

critical.text: You coat the enemy in sticky honey, severely hampering their movement. Enemy loses their next action and takes +1d3 damage from bee stings.

tradeGoods.name: Mithril (1 oz.)
tradeGoods.description: A small piece of precious mithril, incredibly light yet strong

fumble.text: The mithril slips from your grasp and you stumble trying to catch it. You fall prone.

success.text: You swing the heavy sack with surprising force, stunning your opponent. Enemy loses their next action.

critical.text: The mithril glows with inner light as you strike, dealing devastating damage. +2d4 damage and enemy is blinded for 1 round.

tradeGoods.name: Locket
tradeGoods.description: A small ornamental case worn on a chain, containing a precious memento

fumble.text: The locket chain tangles around your wrist, restricting your movement. -2 to your next attack roll.

success.text: You swing the locket by its chain, the metal case striking with surprising force. Enemy is momentarily dazed.

critical.text: The locket opens mid-swing, revealing a cherished memory that fills you with determination. +1d6 damage and you gain +2 to your next attack roll.
